text:
Jaela Daran is the current [[Keeper of the Flame]], the supreme leadership position of the Church of the [[Silver Flame]]. She is eleven years old; the [[Council of Cardinals]] appointed her in [[993 YK|Khorvaire calendar]] when she was only six. She possesses poise and wisdom
beyond her years, and she displays the blend of courage and compassion that is the cornerstone of the faith. As Keeper of the Flame, she wields tremendous [[divine power|divine magic]]; she has summoned [[angel]]s to her side and [[resurÂ­rected|resurrection]] the assassinated Cardinal Halidor.

Because she leaves the duty of governing [[Thrane]] to the [[Council of Cardinals]], some claim that Jaela is merely a figurehead for the real power in charge: High Cardinal [[Krozen]]. Some even believe that Krozen was behind the death of [[Keeper|Keeper of the Flame]] Tagor in 992 YK, suggesting that he supported the child Keeper to solidify his own influence.
title: Jaela Daran
